title: Smite Summoner Level 3!
body:
I've been thinking for awhile now, how far this game has evolved from what it was, why is smite still for level 8-10 summoner level?
Wouldn't it be preferred at level 3 now..

I think it will get newer players more involved with the Jungle too, just my thought..

replies.body: i remember when i was new i jus saw damge on smite and always took it but it never did any damge to champs so i stopped useing it
you need to know how to lane to be a good jg
